name: REFERRAL_2
description: The REFERRAL_2 table is a continuation of the REFERRAL table. These tables are the primary tables for referral information stored in the system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: CE_SENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this referral was sent using Care Everywhere.

columns.name: RFL_ATT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the supervising provider of the resident issuing the referral.

columns.name: RFL_CONTACT_NAME
columns.description: Free text field that will be populated by the user who creates the referral.

columns.name: RPT_RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date that a PCP acknowledged receipt of an internal report regarding a referral.

columns.name: RPT_SENT_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date that an internal report regarding a referral is sent to the referring provider.

columns.name: RFL_RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date in which the referred to department acknowledged receipt of the referral.

columns.name: AUDIT_REF_TO_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the name of the referred-to provider.

columns.name: AUDIT_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the referred-on date.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFL_TYPE
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referral type.

columns.name: AUDIT_REQ_VISITS
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the requested number of visits.

columns.name: AUDIT_AUTH_VISITS
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the authorized number of visits.

columns.name: AUDIT_START_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the starting date for the referral in HL7 format.

columns.name: AUDIT_END_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the ending date for the referral in HL7 format.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFTO_PROVSPEC
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referred-to provider specialty.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFNG_PROVSPEC
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referring provider specialty.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFTO_DEPTSPEC
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referred-to department specialty.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFNG_DEPTSPEC
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referring department specialty.

columns.name: OUTST_AMT
columns.description: Specifies the outstanding amount.

columns.name: CASE_MGMT_CREATE_ID
columns.description: Specifies the case management creation message.

columns.name: CASE_RATE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Specifies the case rate override.

columns.name: QNR_HQA_ID
columns.description: Questionnaire related data

columns.name: ALT_PYR_SVC_DT
columns.description: The service date for the alternate payor information. This date is used as the contact date to look up the alternate billing table in the plan master file.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_1
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 1.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_2
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 2.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_3
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 3.

columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 4.

columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 5.

columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 6.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_7
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 7.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_8
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 8.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_9
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 9.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_NUM_IT_10
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral numeric item 10.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_1_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral category item 1.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_2_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral category item 2.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_3_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral category item 3.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_4_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral category item 4.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_5_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral category item 5.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_1
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 1.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_2
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 2.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_3
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 3.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_4
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 4.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_5
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 5.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_1_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 1.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_2_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 2.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_3_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 3.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_4_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 4.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_5_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 5.

columns.name: TRIAGE_DECISION_C_NAME
columns.description: The triage decision category ID for the referral.

columns.name: REJECT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: UK referral triage information

columns.name: TRIAGE_APPT_CHANGE
columns.description: The appointment change comments for the referral record.

columns.name: OVRRD_REF_COUNTS
columns.description: The number of visits approved for this referral, overridden by the user.

columns.name: CALC_SVC_LVL_CNTS
columns.description: The calculated number of service level authorizations counts, based on the service level authorizations collected.

columns.name: TOC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the status of the last transfer of care transmission attempt. If the attempt was unsuccessful, the failure reason is stored.
entries: No profile or not configured to send
No sending method defined for recipient
No order encounter associated with referral
Patient not participating in Care Everywhere

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_6
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 6.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_7
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 7.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_8
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 8.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_9
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 9.

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_COUNT
columns.description: The actual AP claims count for the referral. This number is calculated from the counts table based the Counts Settings in the Referral System Definitions.

columns.name: RFL_DX_ID
columns.description: Holds the primary coded diagnosis for the referral.

columns.name: RFL_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The expected encounter type for the referral (inpatient or outpatient).
